update sku
sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
catalog_id = #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sku set sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, catalog_id = #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, barcode = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, image = #{image,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_disable = #{isDisable,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: sku.id,sku.sku_code,sku.item_code,sku.category_id, sku.catalog_id, sku.barcode, sku.price, sku.market_price, sku.image, sku.status, sku.create_user, sku.create_time, sku.last_update_user, sku.last_update_time, image.url as 'image_url', catalog.name as 'catalog_name', category.name as 'category_name', brand.name as 'brand_name'

sku INNER JOIN item on item.item_code = sku.item_code LEFT JOIN image on sku.image = image.id LEFT JOIN catalog on catalog.id = sku.catalog_id LEFT JOIN category on category.id = sku.category_id LEFT JOIN brand on item.brand_id = brand.id
